    • Field Detail

      • KEY_MAP

        public static final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,AwtCharConstruction> KEY_MAP
        Intentionally hides the HashMap of the parent class. Contains a map of integer ASCII codes to their respective AwtCharConstruction objects.

      • getCharCon

        public AwtCharConstruction getCharCon(char c)
        Description copied from class: AwtKeyMap
        Base method throws NullPointerException because map is empty
        Overrides:
        getCharCon in class AwtKeyMap
        Parameters:
        c - a single char from the range of printable characters
        Returns:

      • getCharCon

        public AwtCharConstruction getCharCon(int ascii_code)
        Description copied from class: AwtKeyMap
        Base method throws NullPointerException because map is empty. Subclasses may decide how to handle value not found case.
        Overrides:
        getCharCon in class AwtKeyMap
        Parameters:
        ascii_code - an int from the range of printable characters
        Returns:
        the AwtCharConstruction corresponding to the input number, null or other as the designer wishes in the case of no match
